location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Colonel T M Weguelen, Commissary General at Fort William

mods.abstract: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to Colonel T M Weguelen, Commissary General at Fort William, acknowledging the receipt of a communication sent on 29 August 1810 regarding a delivery of sulphur of inferior quality, after which no further supply will be taken at Bushire on account of the Government.
